metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6581 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Nagios NRPE 3.2.1 has Insufficient Filtering because, for example, nasty_metachars interprets \n as the character \ and the character n (not as the \n newline sequence). This can cause command injection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-6581` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nagios-nrpe-plugin - 4.0.0-2ubuntu1
nagios-nrpe-server - 4.0.0-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> fix in the commit link are the part for proper processing of nasty_metachars

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.0-2ubuntu1').
